question: Has intepirdine been evaluated in clinical trials? (November 2017)
ideal_answer: Yes, intepirdine was in Phase III clinical trials in November 2017.

snippets.text: Using small molecules blocking 5-HT6serotonin receptor (intepirdine), inhibiting BACE activity (E2609, AZD3293, and verubecestat), or reducing tau aggregation (TRx0237) are also currently in Phase III clinical trials.
